abstract: Trump Organization, complying with New York City building codes, quietly installs four benches in lobby of Trump Tower on Fifth Avenue within days of Donald J Trump's acceptance of Republican presidential nomination; Trump Organization had fought for past year against compliance with agreement made in late 1970s that developers of tower would offer public space in return for permission from New York's Buildings Dept to increase size of overall structure.
lead_paragraph: After months of arguing whether or not Trump Tower was required to provide public seating, workers reinstalled benches recently in the Manhattan building’s lobby.

headline.main: Disputed Benches Quietly Return to Trump Tower
headline.print_headline: Disputed Seating Quietly Returns to Trump Tower

snippet: After months of arguing whether or not Trump Tower was required to provide public seating, workers reinstalled benches recently in the Manhattan building’s lobby....
